title: Grateful Dead Live at Cumberland County Civic Center on 1982-09-17
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi CR-5A > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab 2448 > CD-Wave (24bit output) > R8Brain > TLH > FLAC 1644 tagged. Transferred by Andrew F. 03/2016
source: AUD: Nakamichi CM300/CP4 shotguns > Sony TC-D5M > Maxell MX-90's, mics set-up on the SBD platform, recording by Brian Schley.
